subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Vancouver Canucks acquired right wing Steve Bernier from the Buffalo Sabres for a third-round pick in the 2009 N.H.L. draft and a second-round selection in 2010. The 23-year-old Bernier has averaged 15 goals his first three N.H.L. seasons.
snippet: The Vancouver Canucks acquired right wing Steve Bernier from the Buffalo Sabres for a third-round pick in the 2009 N.H.L. draft and a second-round selection in 2010. The 23-year-old Bernier has averaged 15 goals his first three N.H.L. seasons.
